about_the_game:
Predict, Outmaneuver, Claim

About Tactics Adrift:
In the ruins of the far future, figures of unimaginable wealth squabble over the last remaining resources of the solar system. To avoid all out conflict, they have begun a proxy war fought by desperate privateers seeking safety for their communities.
Take on the role of a commander tasked with reclaiming the lost resources of long dead civilizations. Contracts are sent out system wide and you must use every tool at your disposal to survive and minimize losses.

Key Features:
Turn-Based Tactical Space Combat: Coordinate a small fleet of ships to capture the last remaining resources in the solar system.
Simultaneous Planning: Command your ships in the planning phase while time is paused, then see all actions executed simultaneously in the resolution phase.
Fleet Management: Build your fleet from three diverse factions, each with their own playstyles, strengths, and weaknesses.
Online Multiplayer: Test your skills against real human opponents in manageable 30 minute matches.
Competitive Depth: Gain mastery of over fifty unique weapons and abilities that range from precise railguns to intel-gathering probes.
Resource Management: Make impactful decisions about when to accelerate, attack, or conserve strength.
Physics Based Simulation: Watch the impact of previous decisions affect the battlefield in the frictionless environment of space.
